attributes.action: The BBC should be encrypted instead of the license fee
attributes.background: people that do not watch the BBC should be forced to pay for the programming of the BBC as they are not using that service. Sky are able to encrypt their channels and bill people that watch them so in that case so can the BBC

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
